price: 86. Dan engkau (Muhammad) tidak pernah mengharap agar Kitab (Al-Qur`ān) itu diturunkan kepadamu, tetapi ia (diturunkan) sebagai rahmat dari Tuhanmu, sebab itu janganlah sekali-kali engkau menjadi penolong bagi orang-orang kafir,
arabic: وَمَا كُنتَ تَرۡجُوٓاْ أَن يُلۡقَىٰٓ إِلَيۡكَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبُ إِلَّا رَحۡمَةٗ مِّن رَّبِّكَۖ فَلَا تَكُونَنَّ ظَهِيرٗا لِّلۡكَٰفِرِينَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wamā kunta tarjū an yul'qā ilayka al-kitābu illā raḥmatan min rabbika falā takūnanna ẓahīran lil'kāfirīna
